dropped my phone water spilled liquid damage coffee lake ocean pool
Your phone may have water damage, and you might need to replace it!
cracked my phone dropped screen broke shattered fell on sidewalk road pavement glass
You might need to replace your screen or screen protector!
discharged my phone battery lasts only dies quickly
You might need to replace the battery!
my phone ran out of storage no room for pictures no space
You may need to delete old photos or use cloud storage!
my phone is slow long time loads slowly
You may need to clear background processes/restart your phone!
